subject: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException error in ant junit target
msgSnippet: Hi I am sending this email again since I am not sure if my first posting was posted. Sorry if this is repititive. I have a the following test environment
messageBody:
Hi
I am sending this email again since I am not sure if my first posting
was posted. Sorry if this is repititive.

I have a the following test environment

helloworld.java (package com.aweb.aserver)
TestTemp.java (package com.aweb.test)

The helloworld.java is the class I watn to test wihtin TestTemp.java
classpath settings are

<path id="aweb.classpath">
<pathelement location="${deploydir}/WEB-INF/classes"/>
<fileset dir="${deploydir}/WEB-INF/lib">
<include name="*.jar"/>
</fileset>
<fileset dir="${container.home}/common/lib">
<include name="*.jar"/>
</fileset>
<fileset dir="${ant.home}/lib">
<include name="junit.jar"/>
<include name="optional.jar"/>
</fileset>
<!--This needs to be modified for dev purposes as they will have
actuate home already set-->
<fileset dir="../reports">
<include name="*.jar"/>
</fileset>
</path>

I already have junit.jar and optional.jar installed in ${ant.home}
using a build target install.junit

I have the following junit target

<target name="runtests" depends="init, prepare, compileTest,
install.junit">
<junit printsummary="on" fork="false" haltonfailure="false"
failureproperty="tests.failed" showoutput="true">
<classpath refid="aweb.classpath"/>
<formatter type="brief" usefile="false"/>
<batchtest>
<fileset dir="${deploydir}\WEB-INF\classes"
includes="**\*Test*.class"/>
</batchtest>
</junit>

<fail if="tests.failed">
**********************************************
**********************************************
One or more tests failed. Check the output...
**********************************************
**********************************************
</fail>
</target>

where deploydir is ${container.home}/webapps/AWeb/

When I run tried to run "ant runtests" I get the following error. Can
someone help me out in resolving this issue.

runtests:
[junit] Running com.aweb.test.TestTemp
[junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec
[junit] Testsuite: com.aweb.test.TestTemp
[junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec

[junit] Null Test: Caused an ERROR
[junit] com.aweb.test.TestTemp
[junit] java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.aweb.test.TestTemp
[junit] at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run
(URLClassLoader.java:198)
[junit] at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native
Method)
[junit] at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass
(URLClassLoader.java:186)
[junit] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass
(ClassLoader.java:299)
[junit] at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass
(Launcher.java:265)
[junit] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass
(ClassLoader.java:255)
[junit] at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass
(ClassLoader.java:255)

thanks
vijay
